verses.verse: And the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> came unto me<WH559>, saying,
Son<WH1121> of man<WH120>, What is the vine<WH1612> tree<WH6086> more than any tree<WH6086>, or than a branch<WH2156> which is among the trees<WH6086> of the forest<WH3293>?
Shall wood<WH6086> be taken<WH3947> there to do<WH6213> any work<WH4399>? or will men take<WH3947> a pin<WH3489> of it to hang<WH8518> any vessel on it<WH3627>?

Behold<WH5414>, it is cast into the fire<WH784> for fuel<WH402>; the fire<WH784> devours<WH398> both<WH8147> the ends<WH7098> of it<WH8432>, and the midst of it is burned<WH2787>. Is it good<WH6743> for any work<WH4399>?

Behold<WH8549>, when it was whole, it was good<WH6213> for no work<WH4399>: how much less shall it be good<WH6213> yet for any work<WH4399>, when the fire<WH784> has devoured<WH398> it<WH2787>, and it is burned?

Therefore thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God<WH3069>; As the vine<WH1612> tree<WH6086> among the trees<WH6086> of the forest<WH3293>, which I have given<WH5414> to the fire<WH784> for fuel<WH402>, so will I give<WH5414> the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem<WH3389>.

And I will set<WH5414> my face<WH6440> against them<WH3318>; they shall go out from one fire<WH784>, and another fire<WH784> shall devour<WH398> them<WH3045>; and you shall know that I am the Lord<WH3068>, when I set<WH7760> my face against them<WH6440>.
And I will make<WH5414> the land<WH776> desolate<WH8077>, because they have committed<WH4603> a trespass<WH4604>, says<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> God<WH3069>.
